titleInfo.title: American Medical Center at Denver Sign

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#453 JCRS Buildings, #453 JCRS Physical Plant''. On back of photograph: ''#453 AMC sign (undated) circa mid 1950s''.

mods.abstract: A sign for the American Medical Center (AMC). AMC was located on the former campus of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society (JCRS).
mods.note: Accession # 1271, Donated by AMC Cancer Research Center as part of the JCRS Records.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
